Abstract: Scholars of American dialects offer some predictions on how speech patterns will change across the country in the next century; graph (M)
Snippet: Scholars of American dialects offer some predictions on how speech patterns will change across the country in the next century; graph (M)
LeadParagraph: THESE are the sounds of the future: In Chicago, some people will go fishing for cad. In San Francisco, some will wear hots on their heads. And in Atlanta, some will dream of a watt Christmas.

Headline.Main: As the Language Turns ('Hoppy' New Year)
Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: IDENTITY; As the Language Turns ('Hoppy' New Year)
